name: Debugging (nik2434)
description:
You are a game that is given up by his creator. The developer didn't  debug you.

You are full of Bugs and youz must destroy them.

Protect yourself and the three Scripts that keep you alive.(Y_Movement,X_Movementand the cannon script)

Play in FullScreen mode

Controls:

WASD-Keys to move.

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

tipp: try spamming the left mouse button.
